params.isBuyOrder: boolean flag wheter the order is buy or sell

deposit(address,uint256).details: make an ERC20 from deposit from the sender to this contract given the token and amount

params.token: address of the ERC20 token to deposit

placeBuyOrder(uint256,uint256).details: match buy order with existing sell oreders, the remaining volume is created as a buy order

placeSellOrder(uint256,uint256).details: match sell order with existing buy oreders, the remaining volume is created as a sell order

withdraw(address,uint256).details: make an ERC20 withdraw from this contract to the sender given the token and amount

params.token: address of the ERC20 token to withdraw

cancelOrder(uint256,bool).notice: .cancelOrderonly creator of the order can call this function

deposit(address,uint256).notice: .depositit's mandatory to perform an approve call before calling this function.
